entry.title: Local Area Emergency issued December 26 at 7:00PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR JACKSON COUNTY UNTIL 11 AM... The following message is transmitted at the request of the Jackson County Emergency Management Agency Scottsboro AL. THE COUNTY COMISSIONER HAS DECLARED ALL ROADS IMPASSABLE ACROSS JACKSON COUNTY. SNOWY AND ICY TRAVEL CONDITIONS CONTINUE TO BE IN PLACE AND ARE EXPECTED THROUGH 11 AM ON TUESDAY BEFORE IMPROVING.

entry.summary: ...Black Ice and Slippery Conditions Possible Tonight as Moisture on Roadways Refreezes...
